item.description:
We'll repeat last year's performance, helping out Foodshare with the annual Turkey and a Twenty campaign at the Coventry Highland Park Market. Our job is to be outside the store talking to customers as they go in about the drive and how/what to donate and then taking the donations when they come out. So, come dressed for the weather.

Big D 102.9 sponsors this drive so we expect one of their personalities to be there...last year we had Jerry Kristafer himself!

We're scheduled to work 11:00 to 2:00. When we're done, pizza maybe?
item.name: Turkey Toss
